a Multiplatform Software Developer

I am a co-founder of Beezond. I am passionate about building useful things that affect peoples lives, teaching programming and computer science and building a more open web. This is where you'll find about my thoughts, projects and evil plans to take over the world. #StayTuned

Angolan Silicon Valley Prediction

26 January 2015

Some of the most amazing things in the world started with a dream. Martin Luther King Jr had a dream in which all black people would have the same rights as white people. Mr.Steve Jobs dream revolutionized the entire technology industry so much that if he had not existed we might have maybe still been 30 years behind with technology. Our lives have been shaped by the dreams of great people from all over the world and I am going to discuss a recurring dream that I have been experiencing alot recently. A literal dream that has turned into a passion and this passion has led my soul to the people who have the same dream, passion and burning desire as me. We burn the same flame of positivity and our axis of life are aligned like the planets to one another, our thoughts seem to be coming from the same dimension as they are syncronized to near perfection as experienced dancers in a sombrero.

I was recently at the second meetus event hosted by a group of individuals who are pushing hard to widen the tech and programming community in Angola and there I was able to meet what I believe are people who will take part of the dream I have, Angolas very own Silicon Valley. My Aquarius guts tell me that this year will be a great year for the tech industry in Angola and I predict that between 2015 and 2020 we will see a surge of startups changing the tech and programming landscape in Angola forever. During the same time various talented individuals will launch open source software that will give the country some attention. The mobile tech industry will explode, more Angolan citizens will enjoy access to rich media through the internet and spending money online during this time will be an everyday thing thanks to the efforts that will be made by various startups in the country.

If you are an Angolan and in the tech or programming industry prepare for storm. It will come about like a thief and drag some of us to the land of financial security and success. You can either sit in the front seat or feel the after effects. Stay cool and dream big and yes I was told to write this article in my dream.
